actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to further encourage and strengthen the Nation's commitment for the production and marketing of industrial hydrocarbons and alcohols from agricultural commodities and forest products.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to allow the use of industrial hydrocarbons and alcohol in fuels subject to regulation by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to further encourage and strengthen the Nation's commitment for the production and marketing of industrial hydrocarbons and alcohols from agricultural commodities and forest products.
